com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.page

Class AuthorPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.page.AuthorPage

  • public abstract class AuthorPage
extends Object
    This class represents page on author instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getFullUrl

        public String getFullUrl()
        Returns:
        Full URL of the page which means: domain plus "content path".

      • openPageWithRefresh

        public boolean openPageWithRefresh(int timeoutForRefreshing)
        Tries opening the page with default AemConfigKeys.PAGE_TITLE_TIMEOUT and additional refreshing if the page was not opened with the first retry. Each next refresh will take AemConfigKeys.PAGE_TITLE_TIMEOUT for verification if page was loaded.
        Parameters:
        timeoutForRefreshing - additional timeout (in seconds) for page refreshing.
        Returns:
        true if page is loaded

      • getContentPath

        public abstract String getContentPath()
        Returns:
        Url of the page, without domain part.

      • getPageTitle

        public abstract String getPageTitle()
        Returns:
        Title of the page.

      • isDisplayed

        public boolean isDisplayed()
        Returns:
        True if the page is displayed, false otherwise.
        Assumes that the page is displayed when title of the currently displayed page is the same as the title stored in this object.

      • open

        public void open()
        Opens the page in a new browser window.
